raw_text: Empirical work on NLP domain shifts has focused on the former. For example, Blitzer et al (2007) learned correspondences between features across domains and Jiang and Zhai (2007) weighted source domain examples by their similarity to the target distribution. We continue in this tradition by making two assumptions about our setting
